amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to enhancing health care and housing for veterans and their dependents by repealing Obamacare, facilitating medical facility leases, and prohibiting the Secretary of Veterans Affairs from employing individuals who have been convicted of a felony and medical personnel who have ever had their medical licenses or credentials revoked or suspended.

action.text: Amendment SA 176 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 176 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 13.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 176.
Amendment SA 176 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Flake.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 176 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 13.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 176 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Flake.
